description:
After Escaping from the clone laboratory on Cinnebar Island, Mewtwo met Giovanni where they entered into an agreement where Giovanni would focus Mewtwo`s powers and Mewtwo would help Giovanni`s goals.
Giovanni provided Mewtwo with a suit which would help Mewtwo focus his powers and it was given the chance to show his power when battling for Giovanni at his Pok√©mon Gym in Viridian City.
Mewtwo destroyed Team Rocket`s HQ and shed the robotic suit after it discovered that Giovanni was using him for his powers
name: Mewtwo (Sakaki)
